Sentencas: A high temperature solid oxide fuel cell has been operated in low humidity (3 % H2O) methane using Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 (YTZ) as the anode.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The mechanism of methane electro-oxidation was investigated using ac and dc techniques at different anodic overpotentials and methane concentrations in the temperature range 788 - 932 degrees C.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It was found that YTZ did not support methane cracking and that its electrocatalytic activity was stable over a long period of operation.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Anode performance was significantly enhanced under positive polarization.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Although the system showed good stability under low humidity methane conditions, the electrochemical performance was inferior to that observed for conventional anodes, albeit under high humidity methane or hydrogen fuel conditions.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The overall area specific polarization resistance decreased from 167.88 Omega cm(2) to 10.14 Omega cm(2) between open and short (E-cell = 0 V) circuit.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Altering the fuel to steam ratio showed that the steam reforming of methane was the main source of power generation at low methane concentrations.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Direct methane oxidation was too slow to be discerned under these conditions, but could co-exist with steam reforming at higher methane concentrations.
Titulo: Methane Electro-Oxidation on a Y0.20Ti0.18Zr0.62O1.90 Anode in a High Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
